product_name: bareMineralsCOMPLEXION RESCUE Tinted Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid and Mineral SPF 30
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHSA/FSA eligibleThe #1 tinted moisturizer in the U.S*. This bareMinerals 3-in-1 COMPLEXION RESCUE multi-tasker is a moisturizer, skin tint and SPF 30, with Hyaluronic Acid to boost hydration for a dewy, healthy-looking glow. Perfect for dry and combo skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly evens skin tone and blurs imperfectionsBuilds from sheer to light coverage, creating a dewy, healthy-looking glowProvides 24-hour hydrationOil-free tinted moisturizerDermatologist-tested, Hypoallergenic & Non-comedogenicAllure Hall of Fame – Best of Beauty Hall of Fame 4x Winner (2024)*Source: Circana/U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Makeup Product Sales, 12 months ending August 2024FeaturesAll BareMinerals products are free of parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, chemical sunscreens, triclosan, triclocarban, propylene glycol, mineral oil, coal tar and microbeadsThis product is also formulated without gluten, synthetic fragrance or PEGsKey IngredientsHYALURONIC ACID: Helps replenish and boost skin's moistureOLIVE-DERIVED SQUALANE: Quenches skin with all-day hydration that feels light and refreshingMINERAL-BASED SUNSCREEN: Protects from damaging UVA and UVB raysItem 2633110How To UseApply with your fingertips-Dot onto your cheeks, forehead, chin and nose, then blend outward.Pair with the Smoothing Face Brush:-Squeeze a pearl-sized amount onto the brush and blend.For more coverage, continue to layer with the brush. For oily skin, try the COMPLEXION RESCUE Natural Matte Tinted Moisturizer Mineral SPF 30.Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses Reapply at least every 2 hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.IngredientsActive Ingredients: TITANIUM DIOXIDE 6.9%. Inactive Ingredients: Water, Coconut Alkanes, Propanediol, Silica, Squalane, Trehalose, Kaolin, Agar, Isostearic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Succinate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Magnesium Stearate, Chlorphenesin, Cellulose Gum, Butylene Glycol, Succinoglycan, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Pca, 1,2-Hexanediol, Calcium Chloride, Magnesium Chloride, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Potassium Chloride, Melilotus Officinalis Extract, Magnesium Oxide, Lactic Acid, Alumina. May Contain Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply with your fingertips-Dot onto your cheeks, forehead, chin and nose, then blend outward.Pair with the Smoothing Face Brush:-Squeeze a pearl-sized amount onto the brush and blend.For more coverage, continue to layer with the brush. For oily skin, try the COMPLEXION RESCUE Natural Matte Tinted Moisturizer Mineral SPF 30.Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses Reapply at least every 2 hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.
ingredients: Active Ingredients: TITANIUM DIOXIDE 6.9%. Inactive Ingredients: Water

reviews.headline: This will be purchased again
reviews.comments: So pleased with this product. My favorite feature is it's the best foundation that does not settle into the lines around my mouth and eyes of my 70 year old face.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Love the feel. Love this product. So many tints to choose from for a perfect match.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This moisturizer goes on like butter and feels like skin. It's perfect for casual days when you don't want to wear makeup but feel good. I bought it during the 21 days event and it was the best decision.

reviews.headline: Light and easy
reviews.comments: Fingers crossed that I can keep wearing this because I love it! This is the first foundation-like product I've ever been able to wear for more than a few months without it causing an allergic reaction. I love that it's buildable for days when I need more coverage, and I use it with Bare Minerals original setting powder and a bit of concealer if needed. I love this product, can't say enough about it, and considering how finicky and sensitive my combination skin can be, that's really saying something. Don't hesitate to try this!

reviews.headline: Perfect combo!
reviews.comments: I use this as a base foundation and blend it with a sponge! The liquid can some times be crumbly on my face but nothing I can't push off. Clears up my imperfections and purple under eyes. I would recommend to a friend who is looking for something simple but wants good coverage!

reviews.headline: Best skin tint
reviews.comments: This is my new favorite skin tint. Beautiful finish and lasts with perfect coverage. I'll be back for more.

reviews.headline: The Best makeup ever
reviews.comments: I have very oily and sensitive skin. This makeup goes on smoothly without feeling greasy. I never breakout from it. It lasts all day, but feels like your wearing nothing. And of course the benefit of the sunscreen. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.headline: I've been loyal to this product for several years
reviews.comments: I've tried other brands but for me Bare Minerals works best. It's light weight, can be layered for more coverage and comes in many shades. I like that it's moisturizer helps to prevent a cakey look as the day wears on.

reviews.headline: I can't wait to try this product
reviews.comments: I can't wait to pick up this product and try it love the fall  and being outside with my son

reviews.headline: Would not buy this product again…..
reviews.comments: I returned this product due to it being very watery & coverage was not good.

reviews.headline: Bare Minerals
reviews.comments: Love Bare Minerals. Love how it feels on my skin

reviews.headline: I love this product . . . but
reviews.comments: I've been using this in vanilla for years and love the way it feels and looks - it has the perfect texture. It's all I use for makeup. I don't like foundation and there is no need for mosturizer underneath. The issue is they changed the formula for Vanilla and it is wayyyy too dark and orange. Switched to Birch which works but is ever so slightly too light for me. I don't want to waste money so I use the rest of the tube of Vanilla when not going to work/going out. Don't let your loyal customers down by making unwanted changes!

reviews.headline: My mom loves this product
reviews.comments: My mom uses this solely as a tinted moisturizer and loves it. The extra SPF in it is wonderful, thought maybe not enough to wear on its own during daytime. She loves the texture of it and says she receives compliments every time she has worn this. I have purchased this for her during the sale. Just wish it didn't expire in just one year.

reviews.headline: Hard, Hard Pass
reviews.comments: I have combo-oily skin, but tried this, hoping it would even out my complexion, while providing SPF. I used an oil control primer underneath. Tried it on a cool, dry night. This item separated/broke apart badly on my face in 3 hours' time. Hard pass.

reviews.headline: Not a foundation
reviews.comments: And that's what I love about it. If you want a skin mask, look elsewhere. However, if you want something that is your skin ... but better. This is for you. Have used for years, it's light weight and natural looking. So happy to see that the years of full coverage makeup has left the scene.

reviews.headline: Shades are different!!!!
reviews.comments:
I am very disappointed in bareminerals. This has been a staple of my routine for over 6 years. I recently repurchased my usual shade and it is a totally different undertone! I usually wear shade 7.5 dune. The new formula is much more pink and looks orange on me. I compared my old bottle with the new and it was very obvious. 

Extremely frustrating because it has been hard to find a good tinted moisturizer that works for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I would but this product again
reviews.comments: I love the feel of the complexion rescue tinted moisturizer and I love the mini size.  The mini size allows me to  try a new shade but more importantly it is a great size for travel.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this foundation and buy it from Ulta

reviews.headline: new formula gives me puffy eyes and dry flakes around eyes!
reviews.comments: I used to the old formula daily...the one without the Hyaluronic acid in it!   However, my skin cannot tolerate this acid. I now have had puffy eyes, especially underneath. My eyelids have been covered with tiny dry flakes of skin; it is awful. I am not typically sensitive to any products, but my allergist and I have narrowed it down to the Hyaluronic acid. I have to find an alternative without this. The former formulas was the best, and I had used it for years!!

reviews.headline: Nice, clean product
reviews.comments: This product feels nice on the skin. It is VERY dewy. The coverage is light. I'll probably try the matte version because this version makes my face too shiny.

media.headline: First Day Wearing This Product - Already Love

faceoff_positive.comments: This tinted moisturizer is amazing! I am NC42 in MAC and I bought the shade Spice, and it matches me perfectly! It looks so natural. It looks just like skin but waaay better. It leaves you with a nice dewy, natural glow that is amazing. Very light and easy to apply. Its also buildable up to medium coverage. One layer is enough for me though. I applied with the Real Techniques Miracle Sponge. It does transfer somewhat, but it doesn't bother me. It leaves a weird rusty smell after it sets into the skin, but it goes away soon after. I will purchase again! ♥
faceoff_positive.headline: My new go-to!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really, really wanted to love this product.  I've worn BM powder (original) for years and years, and it's the only makeup that doesn't cause breakouts.  Full disclosure, I have very acne prone skin, and I can tell within just a few days if a product is going to exacerbate my acne. This product did just that---it happened fast, and it was oh so bad.  Big, cystic-like acne, even in spots where I don't normally break out (temples, next to nose, etc). I've discontinued using it, and my face is getting better after 3 weeks, but still has lingering pimples and red marks.  

This product was icky on it's own---it settles in any dry spots or flaky skin and seems to highlight them.  If you have an existing blemish, get ready for that to seem magnified with this product.

I suspect that this is a great formulation for people with great skin.  If you don't need much coverage, if you have no blemishes, are not acne prone, etc., this might be for you. But if you like some coverage and a natural-appearance to your makeup, skip this one.  It's bad, and it's going back.
faceoff_negative.headline: I wanted to love it, but pretty awful

rollup.name: COMPLEXION RESCUE Tinted Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid and Mineral SPF 30
